    Undergraduate Programs




        Virtual Business and Economic Information Sessions
    


                Want to learn more?  Join us for a virtual info session. You'll get all the details on programs, career opportunities and more. Plus, you'll get to meet current students and learn all about the Chapman experience.
            



    Learn more and register





No matter what path you want to take in business, we’ll help you get there with these major and minor programs.

Integrated Degree Programs
Our Integrated Degree Programs let you earn a bachelor’s degree and master's degree in just five years. First, you’ll spend four years earning your bachelor’s. Then, you’ll earn your master’s in your fifth and final year.









MS in Accounting







MS in Behavioral and Computational Economics







Master of Business Administration







MS in Real Estate



Load
    More



Take a Look Around the Business School
All business programs are housed in Beckman Hall. Use our 360-degree tour to see more of the building and hear from one of our students.
Launch Beckman Hall

Contact Us

Admission Questions:admit@chapman.edu






Career Support for Life


As a Chapman student, you can get assistance to launch or advance your career. We have a dedicated business career team here to help you.


Explore Career Services






Academic Partner


As an Academic Partner with CAIA. Argyros School students and alumni will have access to the CAIA Association’s curriculum and events, and will be eligible to apply for scholarships to earn CAIA Charter designation. Earning the CAIA Charter designation is valued by top employers and recognized as the highest standard of achievement in alternative investment education.


Learn more about the CAIA Association 






Financial Data at Your Fingertips


Chapman’s Janes Financial Center houses 12 Bloomberg Terminals for you to work on your Bloomberg Certification.


Explore Financial Center






Relevant Experience for a Rewarding Career

The Data Analytics Accelerator is designed to prepare you for 21st-century jobs that pay a premium and propel your success, with a focus on real-world issues you will face in business. 


Learn more about the Data Analytics Accelerator
